Description.Name: Hellion
Description.Details: Alicia 'Hellion' McEvedy Comes from the Deep Periphery, only disclosing that she had a strict upbringing she couldn't stand anymore, a hotheaded capable pilot willing to get into the middle of any brawl and surprisingly adept at making LosTech just work. She has a deep distrust towards ComStar and smiles sharkishly when someone mentions the Exodus. She was known as a Pirate Queen by the name of ''LadyAlekto''.
